channel.title: Finmacadmin on MacAdmin.fi
channel.description: Recent content in Finmacadmin on MacAdmin.fi

item.title: FinMacAdmin 12.12.2017
item.description: FinMacAdmin 2017 pt.2 - First time second time in a calendar year! Second event of the year takes place in downtown Helsinki, with topics ranging from WiFi to Swift. We will also hear about new things happening in Apple ecosystem - and of course, meet colleagues! Attending: We are sold out. However, you can follow the registration page at https://www.regonline.com/FI_EMEIA_TP_ENT_171212_2091372 for cancellations. Venue: The event will be held in the World Trade Center Helsinki.

item.title: FinMacAdmin 20.1.2017
item.description: After a short hiatus, FinMacAdmin is back again - bigger and better than ever! This year, the organizers will bring you our first ever guests from outside Finnish borders as Henry Stamerjohann (Slack:@henry) from Apfelwerk and Viktor Glemme (Slack:@glemme) from JAMF will be presenting at the event. Henry and Viktor will be joined on stage by the household names, such as Hannes Juutilainen (Slack:@hjuutilainen) and Janne Lehikoinen (Slack:@fatmrcrab).
